description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

OptionConfiguration.description: The OptionConfiguration property type specifies an individual option, and its settings, within an AWS::RDS::OptionGroup resource.

DBSecurityGroupMemberships.description: A list of DBSecurityGroupMembership name strings used for this option.

OptionName.description: The configuration of options to include in a group.

OptionSettings.description: The option settings to include in an option group.

Port.description: The optional port for the option.

VpcSecurityGroupMemberships.description: A list of VpcSecurityGroupMembership name strings used for this option.

OptionSetting.description: The OptionSetting property type specifies the value for an option within an OptionSetting property.

Name.description: The name of the option that has settings that you can set.

Value.description: The current value of the option setting.

EngineName.description: Specifies the name of the engine that this option group should be associated with.

MajorEngineVersion.description: Specifies the major version of the engine that this option group should be associated with.

OptionConfigurations.description: A list of all available options

OptionGroupDescription.description: The description of the option group.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
